inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: jaundice, hepatosplenomegaly and hypotonia of the upper limbs

inclusion.criterion: at least 3 sites were matched within 6 HLA sites
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Wilson disease was confirmed by high liver copper concentration (305 μg/g dry weight of liver)

exclusion.criterion: donor: not the same blood type
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: 1 or 2 sites were matched within 6 HLA sites
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: A 22-year-old Caucasian man with Wilson disease, confirmed by high liver copper concentration.
